title: are u serious
body:
ive literally done everything i can.
and riot isnt gonna revert anything so here it goes.
im not gnna get any lp back or the amount of time i wasted back so do me one favor atleast and fix your client thats broken.
once again during champion select client freezes i have lost over 4 promo games, lost more than 50 lp, and waited more than atleast 4 hrs in total because the client decides to freeze during champ select.
while im on my wait im making this post so you guys understand how annoying this issue is and you guys have done nothing about it in the last few patches.
ive repaired client use hextech repair.
please fix.

replies.body:
Hi Enox,

I completely understand your frustration, as I have been on the receiving end of the problems you describe. I have been in contact with 2 of Riot's Tech Supports through the League of Legends Support Tickets, and have extensively communicated my issues here on the forum as well... as @Broporo can attest to. 

Riot asked me to run a program called Win_MTR which can check for ping spikes one might experience.
They gave me the following addresses to run and check
192.64.170.252
104.160.131.1
Google.com (this is obviously the control group)

The results it gave me were basically that there was a ping issue between me and the Riot Server in Chicago. According to Riot this would be a problem with my ISP, although I am not entirely convinced of this, as many other people have been reporting similar issues. 

A little earlier my client automatically repatched itself, I assume done by Riot remotely. I have not yet tested whether the issues of freezes in Champ Select, DC's, and lag spikes in-game have been resolved.

I hope this may be of help to you.

Kind regards,
H33P
bump this shit is stressing me the fuck out

Those loading screens can often freeze if your network loses its connection with our network. It could have just been some kind of hiccup, but the best thing to do at this point would be to step back and troubleshoot this before hopping back in ranked and risking this happening again. 

Let's start with the basics by running through this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to update some of your network settings. Test it in a **custom game** to avoid potentially disconnecting from another ranked match.
